remarks: Reversal of ~ unitmulcl in a commutative ring.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Apr-2016.)
statement:
unitmulcl.1 $e |- U = ( Unit ` R ) $.
unitmulcl.2 $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
unitmulclb.1 $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
unitmulclb $p |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( ( X .x. Y ) e. U <-> ( X e. U /\ Y e. U ) ) ) $.
